When you click on the pics of each episode, is it going straight to 
some kind of animation?  It's bringing up Real Player on my desktop 
when I click on images, trying to connect, and the site owner says 
something about being worried about the links actually showing the 
film... am I reading that right?  My computer isn't always reliable 
when it comes to loading various media and I'm too sick right now to 
fool with it, but I thought I'd mention something...

phil

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Tiffany" <makoto@s...> wrote:
> "Shinsengumi" 2000 http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0400817/
> is an animated movie...I think "stop-motion" with paper
> dolls?...Kodachiko Kureru's site has some pics of this unique
> film...it's based on a manga by Hiroshi Kurogane.  I ordered this 
book
> and it hasn't arrived yet.
> 
> Kodachiko's site (there is a pic of paper doll Saitou too by the 
way)
> http://www.angelfire.com/anime2/shinsengumi/kuroganemovie.html
> 
> The thing that is driving me insane is 
> 1) KON ICHIKAWA directed it!!! My fav films from him are THE KEY and
> BURMESE HARP...Kon Ichikawa has a background in animation so this 
film
> must've been fabulous
> 
> 2) Kiichi Nakai does the voice of Hijikata Toshizo!
> For those of you who haven't seen MIBUGISHIDEN...Kiichi Nakai is the
> actor who portrays Yoshimura Kanichiro (I spelled the name wrong). 
> Maybe this actor is a closet Shinsengumi fan:)
> 
> Why oh why is this film not available for purchase!!!!
